name: Traggo
short_description: Simple and lightweight time tracking application for personal productivity.
description: Simple and lightweight time tracking application for personal productivity. Traggo is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, time-tracking, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Traggo on your home server to simple and lightweight time tracking application for personal productivity without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Traggo to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
